attributes.action: Should the EU pay Britain for the protection it gets from our Nuclear arsenal
attributes.background: The UK pays billions on its nuclear arsenal, and were part of NATO which is made up of mostly EU countrys. So if a NATO country is attacked by a nuclear attack, then we are obliged to protect them. So why should they not help towards the cost of the protection they receive?

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
